attributes.action: stop holiday companies charging extra in school holidays
attributes.additional_details:
Come on people, we are getting fined for taking our children out of school for holidays but cannot afford to take out children on holiday during the school holidays as the holiday companies are charging a lot extra for those times!!

Lets get this petition signed by as many as possible to try to stop this from happening!

I believe that if holiday companies were not allowed to increase their charges then a lot more children would be in school when they should be!!
